amendment.description: To include provisions relating to designations of areas for PM2.5 national ambient air quality standards.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2200 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2200 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14994; text: CR S14994) To include provisions relating to designations of areas for PM2.5 national ambient air quality standards.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2200 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2150.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2200 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
